Item_CategoryDescription_Etc: Items used indirectly for various things.
Item_CategoryDescription_Cards: Items used for card battling or unlocking perks.
Item_CategoryDescription_Equipment: Equipment make characters stronger in battles.
Item_TypeDescription_BattleCharaterCard: Battle Character Cards unlock or upgrades characters you can use in battles.
Item_TypeDescription_CharacterCard: Collecting character cards helps unlock your perks.
Item_TypeDescription_CharacterMaterial: Character Materials are used to craft character cards.
Item_TypeDescription_Pet: Pets assist in finding Monocoins, battles, or reducing the chance of Monocoins being stolen.
Item_TypeDescription_PetEgg: Incubating pet eggs will cause them to hatch, giving you a pet.
Item_TypeDescription_Ring: Rings increase your characters' critical rate.
